This product is licensed. To view your product identification number (PID) for this product, insert the Zoo Tycoon 2: Extinct Animals disc into your CD-ROM drive. The PID is displayed on the first screen that appears. You can also find the PID by opening Add or Remove Programs from the Control Panel, selecting Zoo Tycoon 2: Extinct Animals from the installed programs list, and clicking the "Click here for support information" link.
